casebody.data:
Second Department,

September, 1968

(September 20, 1968)* The People of the State of New York, Respondent, v. Lawrence James Condon, Appellant.

Not published with other decisions of September, 1968, 30 A D 2d 920. [Rep.

Motion by respondent to resettle order of this *738court, dated July 15, 1968, granted. Order and decision (30 A D 2d 845) of this count, both dated July 15, 1968, amended to indicate that the reversal of ¡the judgment of the County Court, Nassau County, rendered April 7, 1967, was on the law alone instead of on the law and the facts. Christ, Acting P. J., Brennan, Rabin, Munder and Martuscello, JJ., concur.
